description.value:
The carved night hag's hand at the end of this sandalwood staff clutches a rough gem. The Staff of the Dreamlands makes it easier to navigate and survive in the Dreamlands and recognize its denizens. When wielding the staff, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Survival checks while in the Dreamlands and to checks to Recall Knowledge about creatures with the dream trait.

Activate @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Cast a Spell]

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Daze]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Alarm], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Déjà Vu], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Sleep]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Phantasmal Treasure], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Silence]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dream Message]
  • 4th dream message, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Nightmare], sleep
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dreaming Potential], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Illusory Scene]
  • 6th illusory scene
  • 7th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Project Image], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Visions of Danger]
  • 8th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dream Council], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Quandary], visions of danger

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
